meanings.definition: The process of attaching a cover to a book.
meanings.sent1: The bookbindings on this novel are beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: I love the feel of the bookbindings on my favorite stories.
meanings.sent3: The bookbindings on that mystery novel seem to hold secrets of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her bookbindings were like armor protecting the precious words within.
meanings.sent5: The intricate bookbindings gleamed under the soft light of the library.

meanings.definition: The material used to cover a book.
meanings.sent1: The bookbindings of this journal are made of soft leather.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a variety of bookbindings to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The bookbindings of that old tome looked like they had stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: The bookbindings resembled a cozy blanket wrapping around the pages.
meanings.sent5: The bookbindings smelled of fresh ink and paper, inviting you to read.

meanings.definition: The art or trade of binding books.
meanings.sent1: She studied bookbindings to become a skilled bookbinder.
meanings.sent2: The bookshop owner was passionate about the art of bookbindings.
meanings.sent3: His bookbindings were so good, they seemed to dance off the shelves.
meanings.sent4: The bookbindings created by the master bookbinder were sought after by collectors.
meanings.sent5: The delicate bookbindings showcased the dedication of the bookbinder.
